CustomField.description: Drawloop next field to send Licensing Inspection Summary report to the user for ODE only DDP: Licensing Inspection Summary Report Delivery Option: SMTP - ODE Insp Approved
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "Pre School",CLQ_Program__r.RecordType.Name = "School Age Child Care") , "SFCLQ_Inspection__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a03r0000000xtER;Deploy:a01r0000001LWSH", "")
CustomField.label: Drawloop Next Inspection Completed ODE
